contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = ''Xenotilapia sima'' | image = | status = LC | status_system = IUCN3.1 | status_ref = <ref>Bigirimana, C. 2006. ''[http://www.iucnredlist.org/details/60720/0 Xenotilapia sima]''. In: IUCN 2012. IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2012.2. <[http://www.iucnredlist.org www.iucnredlist.org]>. Downloaded on 12 June 2013.</ref> | regnum = [[Animalia]] | phylum = [[Chordata]] | classis = [[Actinopterygii]] | ordo = [[Perciformes]] | familia = [[Cichlidae]] | subfamilia = [[Pseudocrenilabrinae]] | tribus = [[Ectodini]] | genus = ''[[Xenotilapia]]'' | species = '''''X. sima''''' | binomial = ''Xenotilapia sima'' | binomial_authority = [[George Albert Boulenger|Boulenger]], 1899 | synonyms = }} '''''Xenotilapia sima''''' is a species of [[cichlid]] [[endemism|endemic]] to [[Lake Tanganyika]] where it prefers areas with sandy substrates. This species can reach a length of {{convert|16.4|cm|in}} [[fish measurement|TL]]. It can also be found in the [[aquarium]] trade.<ref>{{FishBase species |genus= Xenotilapia|species= sima| month = April | year = 2013}}</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External Links== * [http://fishbase.org/Photos/PicturesSummary.php?ID=9180&what=species Photograph] [[Category:Xenotilapia]] {{Cichlidae-stub}}
